dk.itu.team7.game

Class Banana

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.itu.team7.game.Banana

  • public class Banana
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a banana with specified parameters, keeps track of it's position and returns a shape when asked for.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 7: Mads Gade & Rene A. Nielsen
